explanations.A: Correct! 我的 (wǒ de) means my.
Correct! 你的 (nǐ de) means your.
Correct! 你好 (nǐ hǎo) means hello.
Correct! 谢谢 (xièxie) means thank you.
Correct! My is wǒ de — 我的.
Correct! Your is nǐ de — 你的.
Correct! Name is míngzi — 名字.
Correct! Hello is nǐ hǎo — 你好.
Correct! Thank you is xièxie — 谢谢.
Correct! Sorry is duìbuqǐ — 对不起.
Correct! 的 (de) shows possession or description, like ’s or of.
Correct! 们 (men) makes pronouns or people nouns plural.
Correct! 是 (shì) can mean is / are / am.
Correct! 在哪里 (zài nǎlǐ) means where.
Correct! 是 (shì) is the verb 'to be' in Chinese and covers is / are / am.
Correct! 谢谢 means thank you.

explanations.A: Correct! 这多少钱 means 'How much is this?'

explanations.A: Correct! 可以用卡吗 means 'Can I use a card?'

promptLine: zhè shì cuò de — 这是错的

explanations.A: Correct! 这是错的 means 'This is wrong.'
Correct! 公共汽车 means bus.
Correct! Taxi is chūzūchē — 出租车.
Correct! Bus is gōnggòng qìchē — 公共汽车.
Correct! Subway is dìtiě — 地铁.
Correct! Train is huǒchē — 火车.
Correct! Airplane is fēijī — 飞机.
Correct! Bicycle is zìxíngchē — 自行车.
Correct! Shuttle is bānchē — 班车.
Correct! 中转站 means transfer station.
Correct! Station is chēzhàn — 车站.
Correct! Airport is jīchǎng — 机场.
Correct! Platform is zhàn tái — 站台.
Correct! Exit is chūkǒu — 出口.
Correct! Entrance is rùkǒu — 入口.
Correct! Intersection is lùkǒu — 路口.
Correct! Transfer station is zhōngzhuǎn zhàn — 中转站.
Correct! Location is dìdiǎn — 地点.
Correct! 过 means pass or cross.
Correct! 靠 means pull over or be next to.
Correct! Depart is chūfā — 出发.
Correct! Pass / cross is guò — 过.
Correct! Pull over / next to is kào — 靠.

promptLine: chēzhàn zài nǎlǐ — 车站在哪里

explanations.A: Correct! 车站在哪里 means 'Where is the station?'

promptLine: nǐ hǎo, qǐngwèn nǐ de míngzi shì shénme? wǒ de míngzi shì lǐ míng — 你好，请问你的名字是什么？我的名字是李明
question: What does this mean?

choices.A: Hello, what is your name? My name is Li Ming.
choices.B: Hello, where are you from? His name is Li Ming.
choices.C: Hi, what is his name? I am Li Ming.
choices.D: Hello, is this your name? I don’t know Li Ming.

explanations.A: Correct! Asking someone's name and introducing yourself.

promptLine: zhè shì wǒmen de jiā, wǒmen dōu xǐhuan zhège dìfang — 这是我们的家，我们都喜欢这个地方
question: What does this mean?

choices.A: This is our home, and we all like this place.
choices.B: This is their home, and we don’t like this place.
choices.C: That is our house, and they all like it.
choices.D: This place is our school, and we all work here.

explanations.A: Correct! 我们的 = our; 都 = all.

promptLine: tāmen yǐjīng yǒu háizi, dànshì hái zhù zài xuéxiào fùjìn — 他们已经有孩子，但是还住在学校附近
question: What does this mean?

choices.A: They already have children, but still live near the school.
choices.B: They do not have children, but they live at the school.
choices.C: They already live at school, and they have many children.
choices.D: They have children, so they moved away from the school.

explanations.A: Correct! 已经 = already; 还 = still.

promptLine: nǐ wèishénme bù lái wǒmen jiā? wǒmen xiǎng qǐng nǐ chī dōngxi — 你为什么不来我们家？我们想请你吃东西
question: What does this mean?

choices.A: Why don’t you come to our home? We want to invite you to eat.
choices.B: Why are you at our home? We don’t want to eat.
choices.C: When will you come to school to eat with us?
choices.D: Who wants to go home and cook food?

explanations.A: Correct! 为什么 = why; 请你吃 = invite you to eat.

promptLine: wǒ bù zhīdào tā zài nǎlǐ, nǐ kěyǐ bāng wǒ zhǎo ma — 我不知道他在哪里，你可以帮我找吗
question: What does this mean?

choices.A: I don’t know where he is, can you help me find him?
choices.B: I know where he is, can you go with him?
choices.C: He doesn’t know where I am, can he help me?
choices.D: I don’t know why he left, can you tell me?

explanations.A: Correct! 不知道 = don’t know; 帮我找 = help me find.

promptLine: yīnwèi jīntiān wǒ fēicháng máng, suǒyǐ wǒ bù néng qù gōngyuán, dànshì míngtiān kěyǐ — 因为今天我非常忙，所以我不能去公园，但是明天可以
question: What does this mean?

choices.A: Because I am extremely busy today, I can’t go to the park, but tomorrow I can.
choices.B: Because I am extremely busy tomorrow, I can’t go to the park today, but I can go now.
choices.C: I am extremely busy today, so I went to the park, but tomorrow I cannot go.
choices.D: Because I am not busy today, I can go to the park now, but not tomorrow.

promptLine: wǒ juéde zhège dìfang hěn hǎo, érqiě zhèlǐ de rén yě fēicháng hǎo — 我觉得这个地方很好，而且这里的人也非常好
question: What does this mean?

choices.A: I feel this place is very good, and the people here are also extremely nice.
choices.B: I feel this place is not good, but the people here are extremely nice.
choices.C: The people here think I am very good, and this place is also nice.
choices.D: This place is extremely good, so the people here are busy.

explanations.A: Correct! 觉得 = feel; 也 = also.

promptLine: tā zǒngshì hěn máng, dànshì yǒushíhou yě huì lái xuéxiào jiàn wǒ — 他总是很忙，但是有时候也会来学校见我
question: What does this mean?

choices.A: He is always very busy, but sometimes he also comes to school to see me.
choices.B: He is sometimes very busy, but he always comes to school to see me.
choices.C: He is always very busy, so he never comes to school to see me.
choices.D: He often comes to school, but he is never busy.

explanations.A: Correct! 总是 = always; 有时候 = sometimes.

promptLine: yīnwèi zhège tài guì, suǒyǐ wǒ zhǐ mǎi le yìdiǎn, dànshì wǒ háishì hěn xǐhuan — 因为这个太贵，所以我只买了一点，但是我还是很喜欢
question: What does this mean?

choices.A: Because this is too expensive, I only bought a little, but I still like it.
choices.B: Because this is very cheap, I bought a lot and still like it.
choices.C: This is too expensive, so I bought many and do not like it.
choices.D: Because this is too expensive, I did not buy any, but I still like it.

explanations.A: Correct! 太 = too; 只 = only; 还是 = still.

promptLine: míngtiān zǎoshang bā diǎn wǒmen jiàn, ránhòu wǒ dài nǐ qù gèng hǎo de dìfang — 明天早上八点我们见，然后我带你去更好的地方
question: What does this mean?

choices.A: Tomorrow at 8am we’ll meet, then I’ll take you to a better place.
choices.B: Tomorrow at 8pm we met, and you took me to a better place.
choices.C: Yesterday morning we met, then we went home.
choices.D: Tomorrow at 8am I will wait, and you will take me home.

explanations.A: Correct! 明天早上八点 = tomorrow 8am; 更好 = better.
